Name: Little Hanoi Four and a half chilli rated

Content.summary: 'Little Hanoi Four and a half chilli rated' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about London, Hanoi Restaurant, food, Hospitality Recreation written on 21 August 2006
Content.tags: London, Hanoi Restaurant, Hospitality Recreation, Vietnamese, Bun Bo Hue
Content.bodyText:
visited: 20/08/2006

Four and a half chilli rated

Little Hanoi Restaurant
147, Curtain Rd, London, EC2A 3QE

Our comment: A little Gem of a place. Great spicy stock with good fresh ingredients. Looked a bit commercial, non-authentic from the outside, but the Bo Bun Hue we had was among the best we've had.

Tragically the picture of the food has been lost from my camera phone.
